attributes.review: this app is so bad i just can’t take it. i pray for anyone who thinks this man is a good man. i showed my dog a picture of him and my dog puked all over the screen 😭😭😭 i got tickets for his rally in new hampshire, but i forgot i had to walk my fridge. so sorry!!!! best of luck trump! 🧚‍♂️🧚‍♂️🧚‍♂️🧚‍♂️🧚‍♂️🧚‍♂️🧚‍♂️🧚‍♂️ trump 2020, but make it on a tombstone🤩🤣😍❤️
attributes.title: just awful 🤮🤮🤮

attributes.review:
According to all known laws
of aviation,

  
there is no way a bee
should be able to fly.

  
Its wings are too small to get
its fat little body off the ground.

  
The bee, of course, flies anyway

  
because bees don't care
what humans think is impossible.

  
Yellow, black. Yellow, black.
Yellow, black. Yellow, black.
attributes.title: Deceitful app would give it 0 stars if possible

attributes.review: There just isn’t enough pop tarts, I expected this app to gift me 95 pop tarts but I only received 69! This app is horrible!
attributes.title: Food

attributes.review: I downloaded this app and my fingers turned orange and then they became particularly smaller. Is this a joke or something?? I’m writing this review while talking to my lawyer. THIS IS RIDICULOUS!😡

attributes.review: I got into the app and was instantly SPAMMED with adds of some Cheeto puffs merch!!😡the spamming got so bad that I couldn’t get out of the app for a whole hour as my phone was spammed. WORST APP AND IS EXTREMELY IRRELEVANT!!!
attributes.title: Absolute scam

attributes.review: I opened the app to a Cheeto with his fist to the air tryna box me like I know your crunchy but not fiesty. Very scary whoever made the app killed an innocent man and promoted Cheetos because he’s trapped there now😭😿
